about_the_game:
Time for total carnage! Daisy gets nostalgic for her derby days. Braddock signs up with the Colonial Marines. Yeti looks back to when he had hair… and his body temperature was above 0°C. Collect ‘em all!

  • 3 Geo skins
  • Daisy Geo-Skin
  • Braddock Geo-Skin
  • Yeti Geo-Skin
detailed_description:
Time for total carnage! Daisy gets nostalgic for her derby days. Braddock signs up with the Colonial Marines. Yeti looks back to when he had hair… and his body temperature was above 0°C. Collect ‘em all!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 or above / or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti or above / or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 38 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K or above / or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 12288 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or above / or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 38 GB available space
